constructors.doc: Creates a , with a range between 0.0 and 1.0, with a stepping of 0.02. Volume values can be obtained and modified using the functions from .
constructors.name: new

doc: is a subclass of that has been tailored for use as a volume control widget with suitable icons, tooltips and accessible labels.
name: VolumeButton

properties.doc: Whether to use symbolic icons as the icons. Note that if the symbolic icons are not available in your installed theme, then the normal (potentially colorful) icons will be used.
properties.name: use-symbolic
